description:
The last time we saw body builder Paul, I commented that he had some unique tattoos and that it would be interesting to see their juxtaposition against some man-on-man fucking! That is, IF he decided to come back and fuck another dude.
Well, I got my chance to find out, and yes, it was interesting!
Paul fucked Jesse upside down and back, and I quickly forgot about the tattoos.
Jesse just seemed very keen on having a dick up his ass...
title: Paul & Jesse
